definition: to make a correction
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Ben jonson tells us that shakespeare never had to revise a manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 本瓊森告訴我們莎士比亞從來無須訂正手稿。

sentences.english: I let her to correct them each for ten times.
sentences.chinese: 我讓她將每個寫錯了的單詞訂正了十遍。

sentences.english: You also need a correction tape to correct mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 你也需要修正帶訂正錯誤。

sentences.english: The accuracy of the calculation results is enhanced significantly after the correction.
sentences.chinese: 與風場訂正前相比，計算結果的精度均有明顯提高。

sentences.english: All plans are subject to final approval by the relevant Government authorities.
sentences.chinese: 詳細之訂正圖則以政府相關部門最後批准之圖則爲準。

sentences.english: Can you go through this article and correct the mistakes?
sentences.chinese: 你能細讀這篇文章並訂正錯誤嗎？

sentences.english: Revision of the genus Tugarinovia Iljin and its systematic position.
sentences.chinese: 革苞菊屬及其系統位置的訂正。

sentences.english: The present paper reports a revisional list of the Chinese Pamphiliids amounting to 47 species.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道中國扁葉蜂訂正名錄共計47種。

sentences.english: Airmail revised price list but full range sample within fortnight .
sentences.chinese: 航空寄上訂正價格表，全套樣品兩週內寄出。

sentences.english: The adjusted accuracy is close to that of pit gauge;
sentences.chinese: 訂正後的精度接近於坑式雨量器的測量精度。

sentences.english: Study the corrections and edits on your paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究訂正之處，並校訂你的文章。

sentences.english: Point out the mistakes in the sentences and correct them.
sentences.chinese: 指出句中的錯誤並訂正。

sentences.english: You didn't answer correctly. Correct the mistakes and give the correct answer.
sentences.chinese: 你沒有回答正確，訂正錯誤並且給出正確的答案。

sentences.english: The mistakes mentioned above are emended through the method of giving examples.
sentences.chinese: 本文以例舉方式對上述疏誤予以訂正。

sentences.english: A revision of Tabernaemontana in China and Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 中國和泰國狗牙花屬植物訂正。

sentences.english: The scientific names of some taxons were revised.
sentences.chinese: 訂正了一些分類羣的學名。

definition: revision
to study at school
to write a word incorrectly/typo/(medicine) to mistakenly transplant (an infected organ etc)
to revise (text, plan etc)
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
to communicate by means of written notes (instead of speaking)/to publish one's opinion (e.g. as part of a scholarly dialogue)/(in book titles) essays/sketches
to make a copy of
normally/as things should be/by rights/to reason things out/logic
same tone/in agreement with/homology (invariant of a topological space in math.)
pausing at the end of a phrase or sentence (in former times, before punctuation marks were used)/punctuation/periods and commas/sentences and phrases
unsolved/as yet unsettled
to make a catalogue/catalogue/list
to attempt/test run
idiom
variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition
